dict.acceptation: 快的，急速的；聪明的，凌厉的；灵活的；短时间做成的；
（指甲下的）活肉；感情的中枢，感觉最敏锐的地方；要害，核心；

sent.orig: We add the suffix "ly" to make the adjective "quick" into the adverb " quickly".
sent.trans: 我们在形容词“quick”后加“ly”构成副词“quickly”。

sent.orig: The numerical simulation of this model was analyzed through first-order upwind difference scheme and QUICK scheme.
sent.trans: 通过一阶迎风格式及QUICK格式，求解出该模型的数值解。

sent.orig: Now, hurry up! Hurry up! Quick. Quick. Quick.
By using oxidation modification and quick-drying agent, the quick-drying type of corn starch adhesive is developed.
sent.trans: 用玉米淀粉为原料，采用氧化改性法，配以快干剂，研制出快干型淀粉粘合剂。

sent.orig: Then the exploration language classroom instruction to teacher's request, discovers quick-wittedly forms the teaching quick-witted advantage.
sent.trans: 进而探索语文课堂教学机智对教师的要求，找出形成教学机智的有利条件。
